text: "Orange Crush" is a 1988 song by alternative rock band R.E.M. and is the leading single from the sixth studio album Green. It was not commercially released in the United States. It went to number 5 in New Zealand, number 15 in Australia, number 21 in Ireland and number 28 in the United Kingdom. ==Track listing== ===UK 3" CD W2960CD=== # "Orange Crush" (Bill Berry, Peter Buck, Mike Mills, Michael Stipe) - 3:50 # "Ghost Rider" (Suicide cover, written by Martin Reverby, Alan Vega) - 3:45 # "Dark Globe" (Syd Barrett) - 1:52 == References == Category:1988 songs Category:R.E.M. songs
title: Orange Crush (song)
